sqlMap.select:
SELECT JO.NOU_YMD,JO.RG,JO.BIN_NO,JO.TK_UKE,JO.TK_HIN, JO.SYUYO_SU,SUM(JO.SIJI_SU - JO.HIKI_SU) AS FUSOKU_SU, SUM(JO.SIJI_SU) AS SIJI_SU,JO.TK_SEBAN, NVL(M01.KANRI_KOJO,' ') AS KANRI_KOJO,NVL(M01.S_KYOTEN,' ') AS S_KYOTEN, NVL(M01.SEIZO_BA,' ') AS SEIZO_BA,NVL(M01.LOCATION,' ') AS LOCATION, JO.HIKI_FG
FROM TB_NOUHIN_JO JO,TB_HINBAN_MA M01
WHERE 0 = 0 $selSqlWhere$ AND JO.TK_KOJO = M01.TK_KOJO(+) AND JO.TK_UKE = M01.TK_UKE(+) AND JO.TK_HIN = M01.TK_HIN(+) AND JO.SYUYO_SU = M01.SYUYO_SU(+) AND JO.HIKI_SU < JO.SIJI_SU GROUP BY JO.NOU_YMD,JO.RG,JO.BIN_NO,JO.TK_UKE,JO.TK_HIN, JO.SYUYO_SU,JO.TK_SEBAN,NVL(M01.KANRI_KOJO,' '),NVL(M01.S_KYOTEN,' '), NVL(M01.SEIZO_BA,' '),NVL(M01.LOCATION,' '), JO.HIKI_FG ORDER BY JO.NOU_YMD,JO.RG,JO.BIN_NO,JO.TK_UKE,JO.TK_HIN,JO.SYUYO_SU
